Theft (IPC 379/BNS 303): Secretly taking property - 3 years imprisonment. Robbery (IPC 392/BNS 309): Theft + force/fear - 10 years imprisonment. Dacoity (5+ persons): 10 years to life. House breaking: Additional charges. Recovery of property possible.

samples.instruction: Patta endraal enna? Patta peyar maatruvathu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Patta = Revenue record showing land ownership. Transfer: 1) Apply at Taluk office/eservices.tn.gov.in, 2) Submit: Sale deed, old patta, EC, ID proof, 3) Revenue Inspector verification, 4) Tahsildar approval. Time: 30-45 days. Online status track pannalam.

CARA (Central Adoption Resource Authority) through only - cara.wcd.gov.in. Register â†’ Home study â†’ Child matching â†’ Pre-adoption fostering â†’ Court order. Hindu Adoption Act-à®©à¯ à®•à¯€à®´à¯ deed registration-à®‰à®®à¯ valid. Private adoption risky - legal complications à®µà®°à®²à®¾à®®à¯.

Online: EPFO portal â†’ Online Services â†’ Claim. Conditions: Retirement (58 years), 2 months unemployment, medical emergency (partial), home loan (partial), marriage (partial). Full withdrawal: Job quit + 2 months gap. Aadhaar linked UAN venum. 5-10 days-la amount varum.

Options: 1) Ration shop-à®²à¯ complaint book, 2) Taluk Supply Officer, 3) District Supply Officer, 4) Food helpline: 1967, 5) TNCSC website. Issues: Fake entries, quantity shortage, quality issues, dealer misbehavior. Aadhaar seeding problems: UIDAI + DSO.

samples.instruction: Social media-la abuse/threat vandhaal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Screenshot edunga (URL visible-aa), 2) Report to platform, 3) Cyber Crime portal-la complaint, 4) Women-kku 181 helpline. Applicable laws: IT Act 66A (struck down), 67 (obscene content), IPC 506 (criminal intimidation), 509 (insult to modesty).

Steps: 1) Learner's License (LL) - parivahan.gov.in online apply, 2) 30 days wait, 3) Driving test - RTO, 4) Permanent License issue. Age: Two-wheeler - 18 years, Car - 18 years, Commercial - 20 years. Documents: Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate (commercial).

samples.instruction: Police FIR poda maruthal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Written complaint koduthu acknowledgment vaangunga, 2) SP/DSP-kku complaint, 3) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint (Section 156(3) CrPC), 4) State Human Rights Commission, 5) Online: tnpolice.gov.in. FIR maruppathu offence - police-kku action aagum.

Chennai: CMWSSB - 044-28454455, cmwssb.tn.gov.in. Other cities: Municipal/Corporation office. Rural: TWAD Board - Local Panchayat. Issues: No supply, contamination, billing, new connection. Response: 24-48 hours for emergency.

samples.instruction: Veedu kaali seyyum bodhu advance thirumba tharuvaangala?
samples.current_output: Aama, kattaayam thara venum. Veetukku damage irundhaal repair cost kazhichu meedhi thara venum. Normal wear and tear-kku kazhikka mudiyaadhu. Owner tharaattal Rent Authority or Civil Court-la case podalam.

samples.instruction: à®ªà¯Šà®¤à¯à®ªà¯ à®ªà®¾à®¤à¯ˆà®¯à¯ˆ block à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¾à®™à¯à®• - à®¯à®¾à®°à¯ˆ approach à®ªà®£à¯à®±à®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Public road block: Corporation/Panchayat complaint. Right of way dispute: Tahsildar. Private encroachment on public land: Police + Revenue Department. Court: Easement right case. Documents: Old survey records, photos of traditional path use.

Family Court-la file seyyanum. Jurisdiction: 1) Kadaisiyaaga serndhu vaazntha idam, 2) Marriage nadandha idam, 3) Wife tharpodhhu vasikkum idam, 4) Husband tharpodhhu vasikkum idam. District Family Court-la petition podunga.

samples.instruction: Life insurance claim reject aanaal appeal enge?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Company grievance cell, 2) IRDAI IGMS portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (Rs.30 lakh varai), 4) Consumer forum, 5) Civil Court. Common rejection reasons: Non-disclosure, policy lapse, suicide clause. Documents: Policy, medical records, rejection letter.

Steps: 1) Marriage Registrar office-la form submit (30 days before), 2) Notice board-la display, 3) Objection period (30 days), 4) Marriage ceremony (Registrar mun), 5) Certificate issue. Witnesses: 3 per. Documents: Birth certificate, address proof, photos, affidavit.

samples.instruction: Gym/Coaching centre refund thara marukkiraargal - sattapadi ketkalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Service not availed-kku pro-rata refund ketkalam. 'No refund' policy unfair trade practice aagalam. Lock-in period reasonable-aa irukkanum. Consumer forum-la complaint podalam. Covid pola force majeure cases-la full refund kidaikkum.

samples.instruction: Affidavit à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®à®´à¯à®¤à¯à®µà®¤à¯? à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡ notarize à®ªà®£à¯à®±à®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Affidavit format: 1) Title (I, [Name], do hereby solemnly affirm...), 2) Personal details (age, address, occupation), 3) Statement of facts (numbered paragraphs), 4) Verification (true to knowledge and belief), 5) Deponent signature. Notarize: Any Notary Public - Rs.50-200 fee. Stamp paper: Rs.10-100 (depends on purpose). E-stamp available at banks.

samples.instruction: Builder flat thara delay pannuraar - enna seyyalam?
samples.current_output: RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority)-la complaint podunga. tnrera.in - Tamil Nadu RERA portal. Delay-kku interest (SBI lending rate + 2%) ketkalam. Full refund with interest-um ketkalam. Consumer forum-lum parallel-aa case podalam.

Blood alcohol limit: 30mg/100ml. First offence: Rs.10,000 fine + 6 months imprisonment. Second offence (3 years-à®²à¯): Rs.15,000 + 2 years imprisonment. License suspension: 3 months - 1 year. Accident caused: Additional charges - up to 10 years imprisonment.

Chennai: CMWSSB - 044-28454455, cmwssb.tn.gov.in. Other cities: Municipal/Corporation office. Rural: TWAD Board - Local Panchayat. Issues: No supply, contamination, billing, new connection. Response: 24-48 hours for emergency.

samples.instruction: Court-la case poda bayamaa irukku, vera option illaiyaa? (Chennai casual)
samples.current_output: Alternatives: 1) Lok Adalat - free, quick, 2) Mediation centre - court-attached, 3) Consumer forum - simple procedure, 4) Labour Commissioner - workplace issues, 5) Legal Services Authority - free guidance. Ellamae Court-ai vida easy-yum cheap-um.

samples.instruction: Property document lost aanaal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Police complaint (FIR), 2) Newspaper advertisement (lost notice), 3) Sub-Registrar office-la certified copy apply, 4) Affidavit notarize. Certified copy original-kku samam. Online: tnreginet.gov.in-la post-2009 documents download pannalam.
